extendedInfo.description: Watch Tamil Movies Free -- Bored of searching movies to watch on your android device? want to try and watch old and sometimes new movies?Tired of saving movies on your device?This is the app you should be looking at. Old, new and latest Tamil movies at one place.The app has option to browse through over 3500 movies. Search for movie by name, artist etc.The app will be upgraded periodically in order to provide you with more new movies.Over 15 Categories of filter available Action & Arcade, Animation & Cartoons, Classics, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Documentary and Biography, Family, Foriegn Films, Horror, Mystery & Suspense, Romance, Science Fiction, Sports, Indian Cinemas, War Movies.Also Search using the direct name of the movie you want to watch and also search using Sort A-Z, Most Viewed, Most Popular, Top Rated, Published Date filters.Play both Low Definition and High Definition Videos.DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is hosted by YouTube and is available in public domain. We do not upload any videos to YouTube. This app provides an organized way to browse and watch YouTube Videos.In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application.This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service.Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps.You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank you.
